alert.note: Alert for Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 30 at 7:52AM EDT until August 30 at 8:15AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL GLYNN COUNTY... At 751 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Jekyll Island, or near Brunswick, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Brunswick around 755 AM EDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
